attributes.action: More Financial Support for the Ground Root Music Industry and Entrepreneurial Skills in the Music Industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This support is to urge the government to place more importance on the development of the music industry in line with other european states. Currently very little funds are made available to develop the creative skills of ground roots musicians in the UK and we need to urge the governement to support this even more through grant and loand schemes for new entrepreneurs developing schemes within the music industry.
